name: Vue 3
description: Vue 3 has been release in September 2020. Migrating vue applications to this release is highly dependent of its plugins support of Vue 3.

name: Module Federation
description: Module federation is infrastructure-level solution for developing micro frontends provided by Webpack

name: Jest
description: Jest is a JavaScript Testing Framework with a focus on simplicity.

name: Vue Test Utils
description: Vue Test Utils is the official unit testing utility library for Vue.js.

name: Vue CLI
description: Vue CLI offers standad tooling for Vue.js development.

name: jQuery
description: jQuery should be replaced by vanilla JS or Vue components.

name: Rollup
description: Rollup is a module bundler for JavaScript which compiles small pieces of code into something larger and more complex, such as a library or application. It uses the new standardized format for code modules included in the ES6 revision of JavaScript, instead of previous idiosyncratic solutions such as CommonJS and AMD. ES modules let you freely and seamlessly combine the most useful individual functions from your favorite libraries. This will eventually be possible natively everywhere, but Rollup lets you do it today.

name: single-spa
description: single-spa is a JavaScript framework for bringing together multiple micro frontends in a single front-end application.
